mil6.3.11:12.3: tattha → idaṃ padadvayaṃ bj, maku, pts-vp-pli1ed potthakesu
mil6.3.11:14.2: hetaṃ → hitaṃ (bj) | hidaṃ (maku, pts-vp-pli1ed), pahaṃsayati tusayati → pahaṃsati tussati (bj) | pahaṃsīyati kuhīyati (si, pts-vp-pli1ed) | hāsayati kuhiyati (maku)
mil6.3.11:15.1: pahaṃsayati tusayati → pahaṃsati tussati (bj) | pahaṃsīyati kuhīyati (si, pts-vp-pli1ed) | hāsayati kuhiyati (maku)
